titles: An excellent poeme, vpon the longing of a blessed heart which loathing the world, doth long to be with Christ. With an addition, vpon the definition of loue. Compiled by Nicholas Breton, Gentleman.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: [By R. Bradock], for Iohn Browne, and Iohn Deane,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
